answer: <p><code>[</code> is a <code>test</code> command. So it requires space.</p>

<p>It's worth noting that [ is also used in glob matching, which can get you into trouble.</p>
<pre class="lang-bash s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-bash">$ <span class="hljs-built_in">echo</span> [12345]
[12345]
$ <span class="hljs-built_in">echo</span> oops &gt;3
$ <span class="hljs-built_in">echo</span> [12345]
3
</code></pre>
data.title: Why should there be spaces around '[' and ']' in Bash?
